DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate diagnostic accuracy Planmed Sophie Nuance Full Field Digital Mammography ( FFDM ) X-ray System compare screen-film mammography ( SFM ) detection breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Diagnostic Accuracy Nuance Full-Field Digital Mammography Screen-Film Mammography
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : 1 ) To establish non-inferiority diagnostic accuracy Planmed Sophie Nuance Full Field Digital Mammography ( FFDM ) X-ray System compare screen-film mammography ( SFM ) detection breast cancer ; 2 ) To demonstrate comparative side-by-side feature analysis interpretation base Planmed Sophie Nuance FFDM X-ray System diagnostically non-inferior SFM detection breast cancer .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 40 year age old 2 . Subject present routine breast cancer screening ( Cohort I ) OR Subject one breast score 4 5 BIRADS scale result SFM either routine breast cancer screen followup diagnostic mammography ( Cohort II ) 3 . Subject 's schedule permit SFM FFDM perform 30 day apart intervention exam 4 . Subject provide prospective , write informed consent 5 . Subject consider capable comply study procedure include willingness return oneyear followup exam 1 . Subject pregnant possibly pregnant planning pregnancy within next 15 month 2 . Subject undergone breast augmentation breast implant ? Has subject follow breast procedure ? Fine needle cyst aspiration NOT Eligible within past year Biopsy Not Eligible within past year Lumpectomy ( breast cancer ) Mastectomy ( breast cancer ) Radiation therapy Breast reconstruction Breast reduction Not Eligible within past year 3 . Subject invasive breast procedure operation within past year 4 . Subject significant exist breast trauma 5 . Subject history breast cancer treat operation radiation 6 .
